summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3055 for the improvement of Jackson Street, from the west margin of Twenty-first Avenue South to the west margin of Twenty-third Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37023, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
